1010110011000011 0000011010111111 1 -> sum: 1011001110000011, cout: 0
1000010111001000 0010011110110010 0 -> sum: 1010110101111010, cout: 0
0001000101001111 0110011111110101 1 -> sum: 0111100101000101, cout: 0
0110001101110110 0010110110000011 1 -> sum: 1001000011111010, cout: 0

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
